LanguageData.ShowWeaponRangeKeyExplained: To show the weapon range, select the pawn, then press this hotkey. If you double-press the key the range will be shown until you press the key again.
LanguageData.ShowRangeAtMouseKeyExplained: Hold down this key to show the range from the current mouse position instead of the pawns position.
LanguageData.UseColorCodingExplained: When turned on this gives each range circle a distinct color and marks the pawn with the same color.
LanguageData.MaxRangeExplained: RimWorld has its own maximum cell count for rendering outline. Setting this value too high results in errors.
